name: Rights and wrongs
description:
Game developed during Amnesty Jam.

It's an asymmetric turn based two-player game.

-  One player is a country ruler that wants to stay in power and conserve it's wealth.

 - One player is a Human rights defender that wants two protect and improve her rights.

Developed by :

* Gregory Tantucci (Game design) : gregorytantucci@gmail.com

* Michael Destivelle (Graphic design) : mike44contact@gmail.com

* Aurélien Montero (Sound design) : aurelien.montero@gmail.com

* Boris de Finance (Programming) : boris.de.finance@gmail.com
